title: Pill Box
description: Application to help caretakers efficiently manage their patients' medication.
technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, Handlebars, MySQL, HTML5, and CSS3.

title: Food Truck Finder
description: Application used to find food trucks based on a user's current location.
technologies: Javascript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Open Weather API, and Google Places API.

title: Employee Directory
description: Employee Directory is a front-end application built with React.js.
technologies: React.js, JSX, HTML5, CSS3, and Random User API.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A progressive web application to keep track of additions and deductions to a budget.
technologies: MongoDB, Mongoose, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.

title: Workout Tracker
description: An application to allow users to keep track of workouts and the exercises in each workout.

title: Eat-Da-Burger!
description: Application allows users to add burger names and devour them.
technologies: MySQL, JavaScript, Express, Handlebars, HTML5, and CSS3.
